attributes.action: Stop giving automatic rights for immigrants to claim for benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many immigrants come to this Country and claim benefits, including healthcare, education for children and housing without having contributed anything to this economy - they consider us to be a soft touch and we are - if they cannot support themselves, then they should not be encouraged to stay.

rejection.details: Please supply a full name, also potentially overlpas with existing petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
